cards.title: Let’s build on your bold idea.
text: I work with innovators to structure ambitious ideas and prepare them for market entry.

From early-stage strategy to scale, I bridge R&D and business teams in preparation for sustainable growth. I help with strategy, fundraising readiness, product/market fitness, and business development.

cards.title: Let’s dig deeper than the pitch-deck.
text: I support investors with hands-on scientific and technical due diligence, validating both the science and the execution risks behind each opportunity.

By combining research depth with market perspective, I help uncover real value beyond the pitch. In addition, through maintaining a strong global network of entrepreneurs, I can help investors spot the next big thing before it happens or strengthen portfolio company performance.
